methodref.name: NewInstance
methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.

methodref.name: ReferencesCss
methodref.description: Filter or output expression references property OR value.

methodref.name: ReferencesSelector
methodref.description: Filter or output expression references the selector name.

page.original:
CSS::StyleOutput Class Description class for iterating CSS - passd in to StyleSheet class OutputProcess() and Output() methods.
Properties Property Type Description class C
property C
value C
index N
filter_expression C
output_expression C
output C
Methods Method Description PUBLIC NewInstance AS P ()Create a new object instance of the same type. PUBLIC Process AS v ()Process the current class/property/value (into output). PUBLIC ReferencesCss AS l ()Filter or output expression references property OR value. PUBLIC ReferencesSelector AS l ()Filter or output expression references the selector name.
See Also CSS Namespace
